chapter.title: Functional Requirements
chapter.para: A listing of functional software requirements for &GMOJO_APP;

section.title: Application Usage Requirments
section.para: The application must be able to create a new project without any input from the user at the creation time. For instance the user should not have to name the project or specify any directories to save data to until the project is saved.

The user must not have to configure their audio device so that the project is played back at the correct/intended samplerate. Which also means that they must not have to know what the correct or intended samplerate is, it should just work.

section.title: User Interface
section.para: The user interface should try to be as similar as possible to Cubase while following the Gnome HIG.

listitem.para: The minimum size of every window must be less than 1024x768 pixels.
